info.name: BtDotDKPrintable
info.description: Make the bt.dk "printer friendly" pages truly friendly: let lines wrap automatically at any scale/width, and remove videos and Facebook boxes.  Also reduce the size of ridiculously large headlines and remove a bit of space.
info.additionalInfo:
* 20141022 r1.1.0:
- Hopefully support latest Firefox now (min-width wasn't properly reset)
- Also remove videos (WebTV) and Facebook boxes (any iframes actually)

* 20140927 r1.0.0: First public release
